BootstrapOptionsGroup.ToolTip: Special preferences that require the application to be restarted after a change.

driverOptionId.ToolTip: The driver used to display the graphics

spacemouseDriverOptionId.ToolTip: Changes the version of the SpaceMouse SDK used by Fusion. For unsupported devices, use the Older setting.

NetworkOptionGroup.ToolTip: This is a set of options used for network access.

SSLVerifyPeerOptionId.ToolTip: Ensure that the Autodesk Fusion 360 client can validate the server SSL certificate.
